text:
You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_27708484_3 (overall_goals_scored INTEGER, stadium VARCHAR)
User:how many overall goals were scored at moses mabhida stadium?
Assistant:SELECT MAX(overall_goals_scored) FROM table_27708484_3 WHERE stadium = "Moses Mabhida stadium"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE job_history (employee_id VARCHAR)
User:display the ID for those employees who did two or more jobs in the past.
Assistant:SELECT employee_id FROM job_history GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE classroom (building VARCHAR, capacity INTEGER)
User:Find the maximum and average capacity among rooms in each building.
Assistant:SELECT MAX(capacity), AVG(capacity), building FROM classroom GROUP BY building

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_22 (weight INTEGER, home_town VARCHAR)
User:What is the total combined weight of players from minnetonka, mn?
Assistant:SELECT SUM(weight) FROM table_name_22 WHERE home_town = "minnetonka, mn"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE Faculty (rank VARCHAR)
User:For each faculty rank, show the number of faculty members who have it.
Assistant:SELECT rank, COUNT(*) FROM Faculty GROUP BY rank

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_93 (grid VARCHAR, laps VARCHAR)
User:What grid has 2 laps?
Assistant:SELECT grid FROM table_name_93 WHERE laps = "2"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_88 (silver INTEGER, nation VARCHAR, rank VARCHAR)
User:What was the average number of silver medals won by France when they are ranked higher than 8?
Assistant:SELECT AVG(silver) FROM table_name_88 WHERE nation = "france" AND rank > 8

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_19524523_1 (champ_car_world_series__2004_2007_ INTEGER)
User:What is the minimum number of wins possible for the Champ Car World Series among all the drivers?
Assistant:SELECT MIN(champ_car_world_series__2004_2007_) FROM table_19524523_1

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_17628022_2 (pregame_host VARCHAR, sideline_reporters VARCHAR)
User:Who were the pregame hosts when the sideline reporters were Steve Armitage and Brenda Irving?
Assistant:SELECT pregame_host FROM table_17628022_2 WHERE sideline_reporters = "Steve Armitage and Brenda Irving"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_17 (position VARCHAR, school_country VARCHAR)
User:What position does the player from tulsa play?
Assistant:SELECT position FROM table_name_17 WHERE school_country = "tulsa"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_18025024_7 (save VARCHAR, score VARCHAR)
User:How many saves were in the Georgia game, versus the Bulldogs, with a score of 7-6?
Assistant:SELECT save FROM table_18025024_7 WHERE score = "7-6"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_17516922_1 (color_commentator VARCHAR, year VARCHAR)
User:What color commentator(s) were in 2010?
Assistant:SELECT color_commentator FROM table_17516922_1 WHERE year = 2010

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_90 (laws_against_homosexuality VARCHAR, penalty VARCHAR, country VARCHAR)
User:What law has a penalty of — in Iraq?
Assistant:SELECT laws_against_homosexuality FROM table_name_90 WHERE penalty = "—" AND country = "iraq"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_3 (fixtures INTEGER, clubs_involved VARCHAR)
User:When 4 clubs are involved, what is the average number of fixtures?
Assistant:SELECT AVG(fixtures) FROM table_name_3 WHERE clubs_involved = 4

SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_80 (player VARCHAR, score VARCHAR)
User:What Player had a Score of 70-71=141?
Assistant:SELECT player FROM table_name_80 WHERE score = 70 - 71 = 141

CREATE TABLE table_16278673_1 (inhabitants_per_km² INTEGER, markatal VARCHAR)
User:Name the minimum inhabitants for markatal 49
Assistant:SELECT MIN(inhabitants_per_km²) FROM table_16278673_1 WHERE markatal = 49

Assistant:SELECT branding FROM table_2610582_3 WHERE callsign = "DWBA-TV"

SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_34 (e_greenberg VARCHAR, t_wyka VARCHAR)
User:Which E. Greenberg has a T. Wyka of 10,793 (70%)?
Assistant:SELECT e_greenberg FROM table_name_34 WHERE t_wyka = "10,793 (70%)"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_23 (result VARCHAR, week VARCHAR, attendance VARCHAR)
User:What was the result of the game prior to week 9 with an attendance of 49,970?
Assistant:SELECT result FROM table_name_23 WHERE week < 9 AND attendance = "49,970"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_83 (game_site VARCHAR, opponent VARCHAR)
User:What is the game site of the game with the san diego chargers as the opponent?
Assistant:SELECT game_site FROM table_name_83 WHERE opponent = "san diego chargers"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_37 (method VARCHAR, round VARCHAR, record VARCHAR)
User:Which Method has a Round of 1, and a Record of 4–2?
Assistant:SELECT method FROM table_name_37 WHERE round = 1 AND record = "4–2"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_88 (dolphins_points INTEGER, opponent VARCHAR, attendance VARCHAR)
User:What's the Dolphin Points when the attendance was less than 69,313 and had an opponent of the Buffalo Bills?
Assistant:SELECT AVG(dolphins_points) FROM table_name_88 WHERE opponent = "buffalo bills" AND attendance < 69 OFFSET 313

User:Who had the fastest lap in the Monaco Grand Prix?
Assistant:SELECT fastest_lap FROM table_name_98 WHERE race = "monaco grand prix"

SCHEMA:

Assistant:SELECT fcc_info FROM table_name_22 WHERE erp_w = "3,000"

You are an text to SQL query translator. Users will ask you questions in English and you will generate a SQL query based on the provided SCHEMA.
SCHEMA:
CREATE TABLE table_name_44 (rank VARCHAR, points VARCHAR, sp VARCHAR, fs VARCHAR)
User:What is the total number for Rank with 185.16 points and a SP+FS value greater than 5?
Assistant:SELECT COUNT(rank) FROM table_name_44 WHERE points = 185.16 AND sp + fs > 5
